## binarySearch() function

Search a number in an array of numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function binarySearch(arrayInWhichSearch: number[], valueToSearch: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arrayInWhichSearch | number\[\] |  |
|  valueToSearch | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

position of the searched number or -1 if it is not found

## Example

bianrySearch(3)
